rows.label: tev071201_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Ton'barac about this place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071201_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Ton'barac if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071201_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Ton'barac about this place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071201_MSG0001
rows.name:
Strange markings... Objects with no clear purpose...
This is a most peculiar place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071201_MSG0002
rows.name:
Perhaps this is a site where some sort of mystical
ritual is performed?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071201_MSG0003
rows.name:
...You say this is a place where "tennis" is played?
Ah, so that is the ritual.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071201_MSG0004
rows.name:
...How's that? A mystical object known as a racket is
used to hit a ball around a so-called "court"?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071201_MSG0005
rows.name:
Mmm. I cannot claim to understand its true meaning,
but this ritual is likely grounded in the mental makeup
of humanity. I would quite like to see it performed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071201_MSG0008
rows.name:
I had been wandering the city in search of food when I
came across this green and verdant area.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071201_MSG0009
rows.name:
But the plants here are quite flavorlessâ€”
and that, I fear, is the least of my problems.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071201_MSG0010
rows.name:
As I was foraging, I was arrested by BLADE for
suspicious behavior.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071201_MSG0011
rows.name:
If Joy hadn't stepped in to get me released,
I might have ended up in prison.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071201_MSG0012
rows.name:
The challenges of surviving within this city seem to
be quite different from the challenges of surviving
outside of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071201_MSG0013
rows.name:
This is where the human spiritual rite known as "tennis"
is performed, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071201_MSG0014
rows.name: I decided to take part in a tennis ritual myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071201_MSG0015
rows.name:
It's all quite fascinating. One must anticipate their
opponent's position and attempt to return the ball to
the most difficult area for them to reach.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071201_MSG0016
rows.name:
While my body is not yet able to perfectly achieve
the strategies born of my mental calculations,
I have grasped the basic concepts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071201_MSG0017
rows.name:
I have already managed to defeat Charles.
I intend to challenge Joy next![ST:wait ]
